TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StructureChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class StructureChangedEventArgs Inherits AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: 包含有关UI 自动化目录树结构更改后将引发的事件的信息。

span.span: Contains information about the event that is raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

related.span: 订阅 UI 自动化事件

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType structureChangeType, int32[] runtimeId) cil managed

param.name: structureChangeType
param.span: 用于指定更改类型的单个值。

span.span: A single value that specifies the type of change.

param.name: runtimeId
param.span: 其结构发生更改的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素的运行时 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]。

span.span: The runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，同时指定更改类型和其结构发生更改的元素的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the type of change and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在返回的值的`structureChangeType`依赖于 UI 自动化提供程序实现。The values that can be returned in `structureChangeType` depend on the implementation of the UI Automation provider. 例如，当项添加到或删除从[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]列表框中，如果提供程序不能确定添加或删除的项目数，它可能指定而不或。For example, when items are added to or removed from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list box, if the provider is not able to determine the number of items added or removed, it might specify and not or . 下表描述的信息，在接收到事件不同的结构更改。The following table describes the information in the event received by the for different structure changes. |`structureChangeType`|事件源Event source|`runtimeId`| |---------------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||已添加的子级。The child that was added.|已添加的子级。The child that was added.| ||已删除的子级的父级。The parent of the child that was removed.|已删除的子级。The child that was removed.| ||已添加子级的父级。The parent of the children that were added.|已添加子级的父级。The parent of the children that were added.| ||已删除的子级的父级。The parent of the children that were removed.|已删除的子级的父级。The parent of the children that were removed.| ||失效的子级的父级。The parent of the children that were invalidated.|失效的子级的父级The parent of the children that were invalidated| 自定义控件可能不能提供有意义的值在`runtimeId`。Custom controls might not be able to provide a meaningful value in `runtimeId`. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何构造和引发事件时，添加子级或从自定义列表框中删除。The following example shows how to construct and raise an event when children are added to, or removed from, a custom list box. [!code-csharp[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: 检索结构发生更改的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]运行时 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

returns.span: 结构发生变化的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素的运行时 ID。

span.span: The runtime ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值可能是父的子级的已添加或删除，或在多个子级的情况下的标识符被添加、 移除或失效标识符。The return value may be the identifier of the child that was added or removed or, in the case of many children being added, removed, or invalidated, the identifier of the parent. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 自定义控件可能无法提供有效的运行时标识符。Custom controls might not provide a valid runtime identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StructureChangeType As StructureChangeType

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]目录树结构中所发生的更改的类型。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the type of change that occurred in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree structure.
The type of changed that occurred.
